content.about: Boise Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Boise area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: David C.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Jennifer B.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Michael M.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Boise provides professional antique appraisal services in the Boise area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Jennifer T.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: David T.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Michael W.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend Heritage Valuations Boise for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: David S.
reviews.content: The antique appraisal was thorough, but I found their pricing a bit high compared to others.

reviews.author: James W.
reviews.content: Heritage Valuations Boise's knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.
